================================================================================
WORKSPACE vs DEV CONTAINER - Quick Guide
================================================================================

YOU OPENED IN VSCODE - NOW WHAT?

Option A: Use Workspace (Fast & Simple)
  1. Close this window
  2. Open: cable_modem_monitor.code-workspace
  3. Run: ./scripts/setup.sh

  ✅ Fast execution
  ✅ Uses your system Python
  ⚠️ Requires local setup

Option B: Use Dev Container (Consistent & Isolated)
  1. Press F1
  2. Type: "Dev Containers: Reopen in Container"
  3. Wait for build (2-3 min first time)

  ✅ No local setup needed
  ✅ Matches CI environment exactly
  ⚠️ Slightly slower than native
